00024 // This class is the generic analysis module     //
00025 // which takes the TGlobalData pointer for the   //
00026 // current tree event and processes it.          //
00027 // Analyzers need to derive their real analysis  //
00028 // modules from this class.                      //
00030 
00031 class FillHistBase
00032 {
00033  public:
00034   FillHistBase(const char *HistogramDirectoryName, modules::options* opts=NULL, TSetupData* setup=NULL);
00035   virtual ~FillHistBase();
00036 
00037   int ProcessGenericEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup);
00038   virtual int BeforeFirstEntry(TGlobalData* gData, TSetupData *setup){return 0;};
00039   virtual int AfterLastEntry(TGlobalData* gData, TSetupData *setup){return 0;};
00040   const char* GetName()const{return dir->GetName();};
00041  
00042  protected:
00043   TDirectory *dir;
00044   TSetupData* fSetup;
00045   bool Debug()const{return fDebug;};

00047  private:
00048    virtual int ProcessEntry(TGlobalData *gData, TSetupData *gSetup);
00049    bool fDebug;
00050 };
